isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Bunk Speakers W/PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Bunk Speakers W/PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: A set of speakers, a volume control, and an optional headset jack is available in the PRO SLEEPER. This enables the radio to be listened to in the bunk through either the speakers or through headphones, with the optional jack, so as to not bother the other driver.
